newsitem.title: GERMANY: SOCCER-GERMANY NAME SQUAD FOR NORTHERN IRELAND.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-GERMANY NAME SQUAD FOR NORTHERN IRELAND.

text.p: Germany coach Berti Vogts on Monday named the following 22-man squad for a World Cup European group nine qualifier against Northern Ireland in Belfast on August 20.
Goalkeepers - Oliver Kahn (Bayern Munich), Andreas Koepke (Olympique Marseille)

Defenders - Markus Babbel (Bayern Munich), Thomas Helmer (Bayern Munich), Juergen Kohler (Borussia Dortmund), Thomas Linke (Schalke), Jens Nowotny (Bayer Leverkusen), Stefan Reuter (Borussia Dortmund), Christian Woerns (Bayer Leverkusen)

Midfielders - Mario Basler (Bayern Munich), Joerg Heinrich (Borussia Dortmund), Thomas Haessler (Karslruhe), Andreas Moeller (Borussia Dortmund), Thomas Strunz (Bayern Munich), Michael Tarnat (Bayern Munich), Dariusz Wosz (VfL Bochum), Christian Ziege (AC Milan)
Forwards - Oliver Bierhoff (Udinese), Fredi Bobic (VfB Stuttgart), Ulf Kirsten (Bayer Leverkusen), Juergen Klinsmann (Sampdoria), Lars Ricken (Borussia Dortmund)
